page.title: 07A WEEKEND IN MY LIFE
page.content:
{Sunday:}I am in the{choir}so I have to get up at 8.00 so that I can be at church for 9.30.After{church}I go to my mum's house and then on to my gran's where we have lunch and dinner and play cards.My mum takes me home at bedtime and then I go to bed.
{Saturday:}I wake up at 7.00 and I read or listen to the radio for an hour until it is time to get up for breakfast.I have a{swimming}lesson in Leominster at 9.30 so we have to leave at 9.00.After swimming I go to the Post Office to spend my pocket money and then I watch television or play outside until lunchtime.After lunch we often go out to look at a{garden}or something.There is often a tea stall so we have drink and a cake before going home.I usually have an hour to watch television or play on my bike
